greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, inverse Möbius transform of a diagonalized matrix of A116470.
comment: For n-th row of the triangle, the inverse Möbius transform extracts A116470(k) such that k divides n; 0 otherwise.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A051731 * (A116470 * 0^(n-k)); 1 <= k <= n.
example: First few rows of the triangle:
Example: The divisors of 8 are (1, 2, 4, 8) so row 8 = (1, 2, 0, 5, 0, 0, 0, 12).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 29 2008
